title: Mata-duree
welcomeSubtitle: Hojiiwwan qindeessi, tarkaanfii hordofi, fi waliin hojjedhi — bakka tokkotti.
feature1_desc: Hojiiwwan salphatti dabali, sirreessi fi xumuri — qindoomina kee eegi.
feature2_desc: Admiinota fi fayyadamtoonni walitti dhufeenya isaanii tursiisu danda’u.
feature3_desc: Tartiiba fi chartiiwwan waliin galtee kee salphatti ilaali.
